data.title: The controversial image of Szymon Marciniak that has gone back viral after the Madrid
data.meta_description: In the last hours, in the social networks has gone back  viral an ancient video of Szymon Marciniak, referee of the Real Madrid vs Bayern of Munich, in which had near a neceser of the group madridista
data.text:
Szymon Marciniak Has been one of the protagonists of the semifinals of the Champions League by his performance in Santiago Bernabéu in the party between the Real Madrid and Bayern of Munich that finish with the traced back and classification of the madridistas to the final of the continental tournament. The Polish referee was questioned by different decisions during the party that would have 'prejudiced' to the group muniqués.

The action that more has demanded has been the decision that took to signal an offside in a played that left quite doubts and that finish with a goal of the Bayern that would have supposed the tie and the extention. Szymon Marciniak Did not cancel the goal, but the played was 'cancelled' previously by the supposition offside. A very seemed case to the goal of Jude Bellingham against Valencia, in Mestalla, that did not go up to the marker because it had pitado the end of the crash.

The error of the main referee was not leaving that it ran the played and follow the indication of the linesman. To the pitar, the players of the Real Madrid did not move and went in the balloon in the goal of Lunin. In this appearance does not go in discussion, but yes in the first part of the action. They are many the images that show that there was not position irreglamentaria and others that yes, but the true is that it has prevailed the controversy by his decision.

Szymon Marciniak, centre of criticisms

In the middle of the gale of informations, images, videos, among others, that have appeared in the last hours, in the social networks has appeared a video of Szymon Marciniak does some time in a changing room where also is, on a table, a neceser with the shield of the Real Madrid that, apparently, belongs him. It has caused a lot of stir in the social networks, although it says little or at all of the affinity or no that it can have with the White House.
